entry.title: Downloads
entry.summary: Your copy of our videos Downloads page - On this downloads page…
entry.content:
Your copy of our videos

Downloads page - On this downloads page you can view and download our videos. To download an entire series on your computer, click on the folder and then “download” in the top right-hand corner. On your phone, click next to the series name. To download a single episode, click on the series name to enter its folder, then click on the episode and then on the download icon in the bottom right-hand corner of the screen, and finally on “save to device.”

If you're downloading an entire folder, you'll need space on your device and an application capable of opening the zip file that arrives at your home. Once you have the files on your device, you can give them to others without needing an internet connection by using your device's Bluetooth sharing function.

Access all videos available for download: Downloads

Send us an e-mail if you have any problems:
Our email address is amininj@tuta.io

entry.title: Android Application
entry.summary: The “ICHA” application for android phones is now available on Google Play.
entry.content:
The “ICHA” application for android phones is now available on Google Play. We've called it ICHA so that its identity isn't immediately obvious to an intruder who might gain access to your phone. Depending on the language your phone uses, it can be found by typing one of the following phrases: Injil Shawi (English), Injil Chaoui (French), etc. For each search phrase we've added a space between the word “injil” and the word “chaoui”, so your search may not work if you don't include this space.

In case you don't manage to install the app on Google Play you can always install it manually on your android phone (not on iPhone) by following the steps below:

  1. On the device, go to “Settings”, “Security”, “Unknown sources” and deactivate.
  2. Download the application directly to the device in its browser from this link: Download app. Click on “Direct download.”
  3. Find out where it was downloaded, click on it, click on “install”.
  4. Find the “ICH” icon in your installed applications to launch it.
  5. On the device, go to “Settings”, “Security”, “Unknown sources” and reactivate (to protect your device in case an inadvertently downloaded application tries to install itself on your device later).

Send us an e-mail if you encounter any difficulties:
Our email address is amininj@tuta.io
